channel.title: Delta Minigame

item.title: Delta Minigame
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:5, topic:412798”]Wow, this is so incredibly inefficient I almost shit myself.
Read up on switch statements, and you even have a duplicate of an if-statement in the process method. What the hell is up with that?[/quote]
^ this, and why didn’t you handle this in another class instead of dumping your inefficient code in the client class?

God, I can’t wait to release Deltawiped-Cortex, hopefully less tutorials for delta like this will arise…

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Minigame
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[code=java] /*
* Void Writereaper
*
* Writes the panel
*
* Created by RsInFection but cleaned up by imsuperman05
*/

		public void writeReaper() {

		 if (Reaperp(){
			setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
			sendQuest("Reaper:", 15894); //Title
			sendQuest("Good Luck!", 15895); //Random message
			sendQuest("Time Left : "+RTime, 15897); //How much time the player has left
			sendQuest("Monsters Killed: "+RKilled, 15898); //How many monsters killed
			sendQuest("Round: "+RRound, 15899); //What round
			sendQuest("Out of         /7", 15900); //Out of 7
			sendQuest("[Forum Name]", 15901);

		     //Right hand side
			sendQuest("", 15896); //Leaves the right side blank
			sendQuest("", 15902);
			sendQuest("", 15903);
			sendQuest("", 15904);
			sendQuest("", 15905);
			sendQuest("", 15906);
		} else {
			setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //Doesnt show any panel
		}
		}

		//This bit of code writes the panel in the right hand corner

		/*
		 * Void Getreaper
		 *
		 * Gets requirements for npc's
		 *
		 * Created by RsInFecTion
		 */


			public void getReapers()
			{
				if(RKilled!= -1)
				switch(RKilled)
				case 1://don't these look better?
					RRound = 1; //what round they move on to
				break;
				case 3:
					RRound = 2;
				break;
				case 5:
					RRound = 3;
				case 7:
					RRound = 4;
				break;
				case 8:
					RRound = 5;
				break;
				case 9:
					RRound = 6;
				break;
				case 10:
					RRound = 7;
				break;
		}

		//this code is the checkup for what is required of rounds

		/*
		 * Void Grims
		 *
		 * Shows player the task set.
		 *
		 * Created by RsInFecTion
		 */


		public void Grims() {
			sendQuest("@dre@Grim Reaper Has Invaded", 8144);  //Title
			clearQuestInterface(); //cleares all those QJ'S
			sendQuest("How To Start:", 8145);
			sendQuest("Talk To The Villager At Castle Wars", 8147);
			sendQuestSomething(8143);
			showInterface(8134);
			flushOutStream();
		   }

		// This is the quest interface

		public int SpawnWait = 0; //Declares the time between spawns

		/*
		 * Void SpawnNewReapers
		 *
		 * Spawns reapers in order
		 *
		 * Created by RsInFecTion
		 */


			public void SpawnNewReapers()
			{
			switch(RRound)
				case 1:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3621, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel); //Monster spawn
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3621, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 200;
					SpawnWait = 160;
				break
				case 2:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1249, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 200;
					SpawnWait = 160;
				break;
				case 3:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1622, 3376+misc.random(3), 3226+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 100;
					SpawnWait = 60;
				case 4:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1225, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1225, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 200;
					SpawnWait = 160;
				break;
				case 5:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1233, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1233, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 200;
					SpawnWait = 160;
				break;
				case 6:
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3649, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3665, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
					RTime = 300;
					SpawnWait = 260;
				
				case 7: //Round 7 = Last round so they get tele'd back home
				  toX = 2716;
				  toY = 9180;
				  RTime = 40;
				  RRound = 0;
				  RKilled = 1;
				  setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
				  addItem(1419, 1);
				  GrimReaper = 1;
				  sM("You Have Completed The Task!");
				  SpawnWait = 0;
				  break;
		   }

		// spawns monsters in specific order


		Now in your method process() add this:

		Quote
		if (RTime > 0) { //takes 1 off the timer every second
		if (Reaperp()) { //IF they are in the requested area
		RTime -= 1; //Minuses the timer by 1
		writeReaper(); //Writes the panel
		}
		else {
		RTime = 0; //Run out of time
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //no panel
		}
		}

		if (SpawnWait > 0) { //minuses spawn timer
		SpawnWait -= 1; //Spawn timer minusing
		}

		if (SpawnWait == 0 & Reaperp()) { //when spawn = 0 it spawns a new monster
			  getReapers(); //Checkup FIRST
					SpawnNewReapers(); //Then spawning
		}


				if(Reaperp() && SpawnWait > 0) //checkup of the level needed
				{
			  getReapers(); //Checkup
				}
		if(Reaperp())
		{
			  getReapers(); //altogether checkup
		}

		if (RTime == 0 & Reaperp()) { //Run out of time & In the area
		sM("Sorry But You Failed The Ghosts Task....."); //Random message sent
		toX = 2716; //home tele coords
		toY = 9180; //home tele coords
		RTime = 40; //Sets the time to default [40]
		RRound = 0; //Round 0
		GrimReaper = 0; //Failed task
		RKilled = 1; //Default kills
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //No panel
		}

		//if you run out of time you tele to home

		//Setting quest green if done

		if(GrimReaper == 1) { //has completed
		sendQuest("@gre@Grim Reaper", 7383); //Sets quest green
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
		GrimReaper = 1;
		}

		if (playerCheckBank(1419, 1)) { //has scythe
		sendQuest("@gre@Grim Reaper", 7383);
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
		GrimReaper = 1;
		}

		if (RTime > 0) {
		if (GrimReaper == 0 & Reaperp()) {
		writeReaper(); //writes panel
		}
		else if (GrimReaper == 1) {
					   setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //if he has already done it it doesnt show panel
		}
		}
		
		//and even for this...
		
		
		
		
		
			/*
			 * Death to monsters
			 *
			 * Adds points...Etc
			 *
			 * Created by RsInFecTion
			 */
			switch(npcs.npcType)
			case 3649:
			c.sendMessage("Nooooooooooooooo!");
			c.sendMessage("Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!");
			c.sendMessage("Ill Remember you for what you did in my afterlife...");
			c.RKilled += 1; //Kills + 1
			break;
			case 3665:
			c.sendMessage("Nooooooooooooooo!");
			c.sendMessage("Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!");
			c.sendMessage("Ill Remember you for what you did in my afterlife...");
			c.RKilled += 1;
			//c.toX = 2716;
			//c.toY = 9180;
			break;
			case 3621:
			c.RKilled += 1;
			break;
			case 1249:
			c.RKilled += 1;
			break;
			case 1622:
			c.RKilled += 1;
			break;
			case 1225:
			c.RKilled += 1;
			break;
			case 1233:
			c.RKilled += 1;
			break;

[/code]
took me 5 minutes to learn switch statements on my own… my conventions got all fked up…

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Minigame
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:10, topic:412798”][quote author=RsInFecTion link=topic=514274.msg3733622#msg3733622 date=1314757296]
Never said that, im simply saying im using this as a base for new coders. And if you don’t like it i couldnt care less.
[/quote]
New coders should not be exposed to this.[/quote]
^ + Taking “little time” is definitely not an excuse to have duplicates of if-statements, and it is certainly not an excuse to use many if statements with one variable as a parameter instead of using a switch statement.

Read full topic

Read up on switch statements, and you even have a duplicate of an if-statement in the process method. What the hell is up with that?

item.title: Delta Minigame
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Today I will be releasing my Minigame. Since I no longer am coding delta I thought it would be good if I gave it to this community.

Difficulty: 2/10 [C&p Knowledge and Where to place stuff]

Tested on: Delta

Files edited: Class client, Npchandler, Autospawn.cfg, And texthandler.java, AND Player.java

How to play: Kill all the monsters before the time runs out, then kill the reapers for a scythe!

This did not take me long so it is a bit rough.

First Declare this in client

public int RKilled = 1; //Kills public int RRound = 0; //Round public int RTime = 40; //Time left public int GrimReaper = 0; //Completion

The declarations are :
Rkilled - Monsters killed
RRound - gives indication of round
RTime - time left to kill monsters
GrimReaper - have you completed it

Now under extends Player implements Runnable {

/* * Void Writereaper * * Writes the panel * * Created by RsInFection */

public void writeReaper() {

if (Reaperp(){

            setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
            sendQuest("Reaper:", 15894); //Title
            sendQuest("Good Luck!", 15895); //Random message
            sendQuest("Time Left : "+RTime, 15897); //How much time the player has left
            sendQuest("Monsters Killed: "+RKilled, 15898); //How many monsters killed
            sendQuest("Round: "+RRound, 15899); //What round
            sendQuest("Out of         /7", 15900); //Out of 7
           	sendQuest("[Forum Name]", 15901);

           //Right hand side
           sendQuest("", 15896); //Leaves the right side blank
           sendQuest("", 15902);
           sendQuest("", 15903);
           sendQuest("", 15904);
           sendQuest("", 15905);
           sendQuest("", 15906);

} else {
setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //Doesnt show any panel
}
}

//This bit of code writes the panel in the right hand corner

/*

  • Void Getreaper

  • Gets requirements for npc’s

  • Created by RsInFecTion
    */

    public void getReapers()
    {
    if(RKilled!= -1)
    if(RKilled == 1) //How many killed to move on
    RRound = 1; //what round they move on to
    else
    if(RKilled == 3)
    RRound = 2;
    else
    if(RKilled == 5)
    RRound = 3;
    else
    if(RKilled == 7)
    RRound = 4;
    else
    if(RKilled == 8)
    RRound = 5;
    else
    if(RKilled == 9)
    RRound = 6;
    else
    if(RKilled == 10)
    RRound = 7;
    }

//this code is the checkup for what is required of rounds

/*

  • Void Grims
  • Shows player the task set.
  • Created by RsInFecTion
    */

public void Grims() {
sendQuest("@dre@Grim Reaper Has Invaded", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface(); //cleares all those QJ’S
sendQuest(“How To Start:”, 8145);
sendQuest(“Talk To The Villager At Castle Wars”, 8147);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

// This is the quest interface

public int SpawnWait = 0; //Declares the time between spawns

/*

  • Void SpawnNewReapers

  • Spawns reapers in order

  • Created by RsInFecTion
    */

    public void SpawnNewReapers()
    {
    if(RRound == 1)
    {
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3621, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel); //Monster spawn
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3621, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
    RTime = 200;
    SpawnWait = 160;
    }
    if(RRound == 2)
    {
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1249, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
    RTime = 200;
    SpawnWait = 160;
    }
    if(RRound == 3)
    {
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1622, 3376+misc.random(3), 3226+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
    RTime = 100;
    SpawnWait = 60;
    }
    if(RRound == 4)
    {
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1225, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
    server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1225, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);

         RTime = 200;

SpawnWait = 160;
}
if(RRound == 5)
{
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1233, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1233, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);

        RTime = 200;

SpawnWait = 160;
}
if(RRound == 6)
{
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3649, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(3665, 3376+misc.random(3), 3236+misc.random(3), heightLevel);

        RTime = 300;

SpawnWait = 260;
}
if (RRound == 7) { //Round 7 = Last round so they get tele’d back home
toX = 2716;
toY = 9180;
RTime = 40;
RRound = 0;
RKilled = 1;
setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
addItem(1419, 1);
GrimReaper = 1;
sM(“You Have Completed The Task!”);
SpawnWait = 0;
}
}

// spawns monsters in specific order

Now in your method process() add this:

if (RTime > 0) { //takes 1 off the timer every second if (Reaperp()) { //IF they are in the requested area RTime -= 1; //Minuses the timer by 1 writeReaper(); //Writes the panel } else { RTime = 0; //Run out of time setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //no panel } }

if (SpawnWait > 0) { //minuses spawn timer
SpawnWait -= 1; //Spawn timer minusing
}

if (SpawnWait == 0 & Reaperp()) { //when spawn = 0 it spawns a new monster
getReapers(); //Checkup FIRST
SpawnNewReapers(); //Then spawning
}

    if(Reaperp() && SpawnWait > 0) //checkup of the level needed
    {
	getReapers(); //Checkup
    }

if(Reaperp())
{
getReapers(); //altogether checkup
}

if (RTime == 0 & Reaperp()) { //Run out of time & In the area
sM(“Sorry But You Failed The Ghosts Task…”); //Random message sent
toX = 2716; //home tele coords
toY = 9180; //home tele coords
RTime = 40; //Sets the time to default [40]
RRound = 0; //Round 0
GrimReaper = 0; //Failed task
RKilled = 1; //Default kills
setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //No panel
}

//if you run out of time you tele to home

//Setting quest green if done

if(GrimReaper == 1) { //has completed
sendQuest("@gre@Grim Reaper", 7383); //Sets quest green
setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
GrimReaper = 1;
}

if (playerCheckBank(1419, 1)) { //has scythe
sendQuest("@gre@Grim Reaper", 7383);
setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
GrimReaper = 1;
}

if (playerHasItem(1419, 1)) { //has scythe
sendQuest("@gre@Grim Reaper", 7383);
setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
GrimReaper = 1;
}

if (RTime > 0) {
if (GrimReaper == 0 & Reaperp()) {
writeReaper(); //writes panel
}
else if (GrimReaper == 1) {
setInterfaceWalkable(-1); //if he has already done it it doesnt show panel
}
}

Now search for: boolean wear(int wearID, int slot)

And under it add:

/* * If the person hasnt completed the quest, it takes weapon off.... * * Created by RsInFecTion */

if(wearID == 1419 && GrimReaper == 0){
sM(“You must complete Grim-Reaper Quest First!”);
return false; //takes weapon off slot
}

Add this in your Updatenpcchat() void

/* * Ghost talking -- Tele to area * * Created by RsInFecTion */ case 666: talk2("Hello I need Help", "Can you help?", 1597);

RTime = 500; //Set-Before time, Backup just incase
toX = 3369; //Duel arena coords
toY = 3229; //Duel arena coords
RTime = 500; //Default time

sM(“10 Kills to pass”);
sM(“7 Rounds”);
break;

add this in your case 185:

/* * Opens up the quest interface * * Created by RsInFecTion */ case 28215: //Case number Grims(); //opens up void Grims()

Add this in your texthandler.java:

/* * Sets quest on quest tab * * Created by RsInFecTion */ c.sendQuest("@whi@Grim Reaper", 7383); //default coloring for quest

Now in player.java add

/* * Sets the parameter * * --Duel arena parameter * * Created by RsInFecTion */ public boolean Reaperp() { //Mgame if((absX >=3364 && absX <=3389 && absY >=3225 && absY <=3239)) return true; else return false; }
This is the code for the area that the panel is written

Now in npchandler.java
search for the method of your Npc death, This is different for bases

To help you search for things like:

+= += 1 npc.isdead
Something like that, Then under it add
/* * Death to monsters * * Adds points...Etc * * Created by RsInFecTion */

if(npcs[i].npcType == 3649){
c.sendMessage(“Nooooooooooooooo!”);
c.sendMessage(“Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!”);
c.sendMessage(“Ill Remember you for what you did in my afterlife…”);
c.RKilled += 1; //Kills + 1
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 3665){
c.sendMessage(“Nooooooooooooooo!”);
c.sendMessage(“Nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!”);
c.sendMessage(“Ill Remember you for what you did in my afterlife…”);
c.RKilled += 1;
}
//c.toX = 2716;
//c.toY = 9180;

if(npcs[i].npcType == 3621){
c.RKilled += 1;
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 1249){
c.RKilled += 1;
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 1622){
c.RKilled += 1;
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 1225){
c.RKilled += 1;
}
if(npcs[i].npcType == 1233){
c.RKilled += 1;
}

Now in autospawn.cfg

Add

//Monster spawning for the Duel arena quest spawn = 1697 [CordX] [CordY] 0 0 0 0 0 1

Obviously you change the cordx and cordy to the coordinates u want.
And there you go, you have your event.

Read full topic
